indicator_name: Annual number of deaths attributed to excessive atmospheric pollution (above the WHO threshold* for both NO2 and PM2.5)
graph_title: Annual number of deaths attributed to excessive atmospheric pollution (above the WHO threshold* for both NO2 and PM2.5)
barcelona_target: By 2030, drastically reduce the number of deaths caused by excessive pollution
national_indicator_available: Annual number of deaths attributed to excessive atmospheric pollution (above the WHO threshold* for both NO2 and PM2.5)
target_line_2030: Reduce the annual number of deaths attributed to excessive atmospheric pollution, with respect to WHO recommendations, by 80%: Less than 300
target_name: Substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses caused by hazardous chemical products and air, water and soil pollution
